## Properties

| Property        | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                | Type      | Default |
| --------------- | ----------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `hideWhenEmpty` | `hide-when-empty` | Toggle this switch to hide the counter when the cart is empty instead of showing `0` in the example above. | `boolean` | `false` |
